channel.title: Random Sound Challenge!
channel.description: Hey Guys! So Last night I was out of Ideas for what instruments to use. So I just made a new track, and to add sounds all I did was tap "Add Sound", "Melodic" or "Drums", then press done in the top right corner. I actually had fun with the sounds I've never used before. It was so easy and gave me something to do. Rules: Length: 0:30 - 3:00 Number of Instruments: As many as you want Genre: Any ≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡ Now I challenge you to do the same, but, record it, upload to youtube and SoundCloud, and Post it here. Have fun! Thanks! - Little Baby

item.title: Random Sound Challenge!
item.dc:creator: Artichoke
item.description:
https://app.auxy.co/projects/rq5v93f21u8YVHBYrdCEJQ==

It has a rough start, with that dark theme that’s sort of showing up in my productions as of late. And it’s pretty short, too. But I like where it goes, at least. Enjoy.

Oh, and—I broke the rules, sort of; I cheated and made the Sweeper effect instead of Kiss, which was what it originally was randomly selected as. Feel free to change it back to Kiss for the most authentic experience )

item.title: Random Sound Challenge!
item.dc:creator: Little_Baby
item.description:
Hey Guys! So Last night I was out of Ideas for what instruments to use. So I just made a new track, and to add sounds all I did was tap “Add Sound”, “Melodic” or “Drums”, then press done in the top right corner. I actually had fun with the sounds I’ve never used before. It was so easy and gave me something to do.

Rules:

Length: 0:30 - 3:00

Number of Instruments: As many as you want

Genre: Any

≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡
Now I challenge you to do the same, but, record it, upload to youtube and SoundCloud, and Post it here. Have fun!

Thanks!
- Little Baby

Read full topic
